supported.lookup: Brum will analyse a list of ip-addresses (must be a JSON file)
supported.createreport: Brum will use a file created by *analyse* and generate information about this file
supported.readreport: Brum will read a .json file from *createreport* and present it
supported.getroothints: Brum will download all the Authorative Hint Root servers from IANA
supported.getrootzone: Brum will download all the Authorative Root servers from IANA
